CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Stock_or_Long_Call__c , 'Long Call Option'), Total_Long_Option_Net_Debit__c , Total_Stock_Share_Net_Debit__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the Net Debit on your Long Position. If this Base Position has an underlying of "Long Call Option" it is the sum of all Long Option Order Principals. If the underlying is "Stock/Equity" it is the Sum of all Stock Share Order Principals.
CustomField.label: Total Long Position Net Debit
